column5: i haven't been able to get a clear answer (other than "it's newer technology"  )  what is so special about teh terrova to justify a $500+ price difference between a 70lb PD2 and an 80LB terrova  (other than 10lb thrust)?  can anyone here shed some light?
This is what I got from another fishing forum..   Personally, I don't see the added value.
